reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Organizational development and ongoing activities of the Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition

description.narrative: The Tanzania Human Rights Defenders Coalition has been implementing a good number of activities which include, Evacuated a human rights defender,issued a press statement calling upon the government to realease its entire team of 16 activists after the arre st following medical doctors strike in Dar city, conducted capacity building trainings in collaboration with Uganda and Kenya Protection Desks 40 HRDs from across the country on risk assessment and security management, the coalition also networked with sev eral regional and international HRDs organisations.The Coalition has been in operation since 2011 but due to lack of financial and human resources some of the activities are yet to be implemented. The Coalition thus seeks some funds to finalise the follow ing activities: capacity building for THRD - Coalition management, security training for new members, official launch of the strategic plan, strengthening existing efforts taken against threats facing HRDs in Tanzania for the past six months,board members and AGM meetings for the year 2012 and administrative costs. The main objectives of the project are: to build protection and security management capacity of HRDs in Tanzania, to enhance the security and protection of HRDs in this country and to advocate fo r recognition of HRDs in this country through lobbying and advocacy.The expected final results of the activities are: community capacity to address HRDs rights improved, security management self protection at individual level and national level improved, t hreats and attacks towards HRD decreased, coalition management capacity increased, coalition financial capacity improaved after official launching of the five years strategic plan, coalition good governance and accountability improved, coalition's visibili ty improved and accessed by the target group.
